error.rate_limited: Too many requests. Please wait a few minutes and try again.

reauth_confirm.description: Authentication tokens became invalid, login to recreate them. Optionally provide your MFA secret key to avoid future manual MFA prompts.

user.description: Enter your Monarch Money credentials. Optionally provide your MFA secret key for automatic authentication (found in Settings -> Security -> Enable MFA -> copy the 'Two-factor text code').

mfa.description: Enter the multi-factor authentication code from your authenticator app.

mfa_setup.description: Set up Monarch Money with optional MFA secret key for automatic authentication. The MFA secret key can be found when setting up MFA in Monarch Money (Settings -> Security -> Enable MFA).
